extracted_information: Dropbox Sign (formerly HelloSign) offers robust document template features designed to streamline agreement workflows. Users can leverage a comprehensive Template Gallery with over 40 pre-built templates or create custom reusable templates from their own documents. The platform supports a flexible template editor with drag-and-drop functionality for various field types. Integrations are available with popular business tools, and API capabilities allow for embedded template management.

template_gallery_access.free_plan: Browse and send signature requests via template

features.name: Template Gallery
features.description: Immediate access to over 40 essential pre-built templates tailored for common document needs (HR, Sales, Real Estate, general business).

features.name: Custom Template Creation
features.description: Ability to transform frequently used documents into custom, reusable templates for seamless reuse in signature requests.

features.name: Template Editor (Signer Fields)
features.description: Drag-and-drop interface for placing signature blocks, text fields, checkboxes, dates, drop-downs, radio buttons, and clickable links onto documents.

features.name: Variable Signers
features.description: Advanced signing tool allowing for dynamic signer roles.

features.name: Data Validation
features.description: Real-time validation of signer fields based on user-determined criteria to ensure accurate data collection.

features.name: Embedded Template Management
features.description: API capability to embed template creation and management within an iFrame on a website.

features.name: Embedded Requesting
features.description: Embed the document preparation process within an iFrame on a website.

features.name: Embedded Signing
features.description: Embed Dropbox Sign into a website for an in-app signing experience.

features.name: Bulk Send
features.description: Send individual signature requests to a large list of recipients with a single click.

features.name: Signer Attachments
features.description: Seamlessly collect file attachments from signers as part of the signature request.

features.name: Advanced Signing Tools
features.description: Includes features like Signer Reassignment and Variable Signers.

features.name: Premium Branding
features.description: Personalize the signing experience across multiple applications, customize emails, signer pages, logos, and remove Dropbox Sign mention.

features.name: API Dashboard
features.description: View status of API requests and inspect callbacks for troubleshooting.

features.name: API Test Mode
features.description: Allows developers to build and test end-to-end eSignature workflows for free.

features.name: Multiple Domains
features.description: Send signature requests from multiple domains under one account.

features.name: Audit Trail
features.description: Associated with transactions to track and time-stamp actions, minimizing contractual arguments.

features.name: Tamper-proof Documents
features.description: Ensures individual documents within a signature request are protected from modifications.

temporal_info.current_information_as_of: Content reflects current product offerings, no explicit future-dated features for 2025.

geographical_data.template_gallery_availability: Currently available in English for U.S. users, with plans for future expansion.
geographical_data.data_residency_options: Allows companies to store completed documents in one of global data residency options.
